hero.title: Clean
hero.subtitle: Helping developers practice Domain-Driven Design with a set of understandable elements and executable rules to build highly maintainable software systems.

intro.title: What is Clean DDD?
intro.paragraph1: It includes a value orientation, a set of concept definitions, a modeling method, and a set of code specifications. With Clean DDD, developers can more easily complete requirement analysis, model design, and code implementation.
intro.paragraph2: Our goal is to simplify the learning curve of Domain-Driven Design to help developers quickly grasp the core concepts and practices of Domain-Driven Design.
intro.coreConceptsDescription: Clean DDD focuses on the consistency of requirements, models, and code, emphasizing the avoidance of over-design while meeting requirements and maintaining code maintainability.

benefits.1: Modeling methods are simple to learn
benefits.3: Does not rely on developers' modeling experience
benefits.5: Not tightly coupled to any specific programming language
